      • DAnalyzer

        public void release()

      • loadUsers

        public java.util.Map loadUsers()

        Load all matched users from the construction DAnalyzer parameter attsMap

        Returns:
        a sorted Map of users with username and userDN pair.

      • loadGroups

        public java.util.Map loadGroups()

        Load all matched groups from the construction DAnalyzer parameter attsMap

        Returns:
        a sorted Map of groups with groupname and groupDN pair.

      • outputReport

        public java.util.ArrayList outputReport()

        Output an ArrayList of data

        Returns:
        an ArrayList, which is format of String[][5]. String[][0]: flag String[][1]: request String[][2]: parameter String[][3]: response String[][4]: suggestion/action

        Parameters:

        isUser - if current name is user or group
